attributes.action: Bring Back CBBC's "Dick N Dom in da Bungalow"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although I am very much aware that this program created uproar in the house of commons for some aspects of it, it won a bafta and I feel that with set rules to make it less offensive to some people I see no reason why it shouldn't be on TV when it is clear that both adults and children would enjoy it. I also see no reason against it when it would be on TV at such an early time on a Saturday morning and as it scored such high ratings compared to what is currently provided by the BBC for children on Saturday mornings.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
